tool_description: With our API, you can generate interactive business cards in PDF Base64 format, which can be converted to PDF using any programming language. These interactive business cards are highly profitable and can be sold to customers and users.

api_list.name: download-business-card-pdf
api_list.description: To create an interactive card, you can send the following parameters: email, number_background, color_code, url_or_base64_img, name_or_company, activity_or_profession, complete_whatsapp, complete_phone, address, instagram_url, facebook_url, youtube_url, and site_url. If you don't want to send an item, just leave it with empty quotes.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The email address to be included on the business card.

optional_parameters.name: number_background
optional_parameters.description: The background number for the card design.

optional_parameters.name: color_code
optional_parameters.description: The color code for the card background.

optional_parameters.name: url_or_base64_img
optional_parameters.description: The URL or Base64 image for the card logo.

optional_parameters.name: name_or_company
optional_parameters.description: The name or company to be displayed on the card.

optional_parameters.name: activity_or_profession
optional_parameters.description: The profession or activity of the cardholder.

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The address to be included on the card.
